# [Interview #985: Rithmatist Signing Report - StormAtlas, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=985#6)

#### StormAtlas

Were Cultivation and Honor romantically involved?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
